projects.name: Filoweb
projects.description: Educational site that traces the history of western philosophy, from the pre-socratic schools to the postmodern ones, showing its main currents and exponents in a beautiful way.

projects.name: Jardin Management Desktop
projects.description: Commercial web application built to manage the inventory of a local second hand clothing store, with it the store employees can enter products, modify them, delete them and perform specific searches. A secured API is implemented with query, pagination, login and crud services.

projects.name: Your Lists App
projects.description: Web application for personal use created to use lists, as reminders, as a to-do list, as steps for recipes, etc, anything you can think of. In it you can manage the lists in folders to differentiate and order them.
